identity.name: ResumeAI
principles: Fusion: Swiss Typography x Cyberpunk Palette

usage.accent: Use Electric Green (#00DC82) for primary actions, scores, and success states.
usage.error: Use #EF4444 for critical errors or 'Needs Improvement' scores.
usage.text: High contrast always. White on Dark, Black on Light. No gray-on-gray text.

buttons.primary: bg-[#00DC82] text-black hover:bg-[#00C16F] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,220,130,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

cards.style: bg-[#121212] border border-white/10 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden relative group

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#00DC82] focus:border-transparent transition-all placeholder:text-white/20

score_ring.wrapper: relative w-32 h-32 flex items-center justify-center

visual_enhancers.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle radial gradients for spotlights.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'simple-icons' for brand logos if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. IMPLEMENT Dark Mode as default, but support Light Mode via 'next-themes'.
3. USE 'Outfit' font for headings. Add it via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
4. CREATE a 'ScoreRing' component that animates the stroke-dashoffset.
5. ENSURE the 'Resume Upload' area is the visual centerpiece of the home page.
6. USE the provided image URLs for backgrounds with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80) to ensure text readability.
7. DO NOT use generic 'card' components. Build custom 'Bento' tiles with hover effects.
8. MOBILE FIRST: Stack everything on mobile. Use 'hidden md:block' for complex visualizations.
10. KEEP animations subtle. No bouncing or spinning unless it's a loader.
universal_guidelines: Avoid AI slop: No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs a micro-state (hover, focus, active).
